name: Rise of the Terran Empire (RPGMakerMZ) - Demos
name_original: Rise of the Terran Empire (RPGMakerMZ) - Demos
description:
In a distant future mankind took to the stars. After making many allies they stumbled upon one of the elder races and a war started.

Years later the remnants of a colony came out of cryonic sleep and began to reclaim the ruins of their colony and planet.

Now as they are ready to embark to the stars again....

You a newly decorated captain are to embark on the most important mission of the Terran Empire. You must gather a crew, upgrade your ship

and embark ona quest to:

1.) Forge new alliances and recreate old ones.

2.) Find new habitable planets for new colonies to be created on.

3.) Repopulate the colony proper by gather animals and plants from other planets.

4.) Gather resources in order to rebuild the empire.

5.) Find out what happened with the war....and the ultimate fate of Earth and the Terran Empire...and of its allies and foes.

This is your story....and thus it begins....
